TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObjectParameter extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示傳遞給物件查詢的查詢參數。

span.span: Represents a query parameter that is passed to an object query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示傳遞給 或查詢產生器方法的查詢參數。Represents a query parameter that is passed to an or a query builder method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢產生器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 物件參數包含名稱、型別和值。Object parameters consist of a name, a type, and a value. 這個類別無法被繼承。This class cannot be inherited. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會將新的參數加入至集合。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它會逐一查看 並顯示集合中每個參數的名稱、型別和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, type, and value of each parameter in the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_parameters)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_parameters)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, object value) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, value As Object)

param.name: name

span.span: The parameter name.

param.span: 這個名稱不應該包含在 [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] 陳述式 (Statement) 中使用的 "@" 參數標記，而應該只包含實際名稱。

span.span: This name should not include the "@" parameter marker that is used in [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] statements, only the actual name.

param.span: 運算式的第一個字元必須是字母。

span.span: The first character of the expression must be a letter.

param.span: 運算式中的任何後續字元必須是字母、數字或底線 (_) 字元。

span.span: Any successive characters in the expression must be either letters, numbers, or an underscore (_) character.

param.name: value
param.span: 參數的初始值 (以及原本的型別)。

span.span: The initial value (and inherently, the type) of the parameter.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱和值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式 (Constructor) 會根據指定的名稱和值來建立參數。This constructor creates a parameter from the specified name and value. 參數的型別是從值推斷的。The type of the parameter is inferred from the value. 當參數加入至 時，就無法變更參數名稱。When added to the , the parameter name cannot be changed. 您可以透過 屬性變更參數值。The parameter value can be changed through the property. 在查詢已經編譯完成之後，您就無法變更此值。After the query has been compiled, the value cannot be changed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢產生器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會將新的參數加入至集合。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它會逐一查看 並顯示集合中每個參數的名稱、型別和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, the type and the value of each parameter in the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_parameters)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_parameters)]

exception.span: 如果任何一個引數的值為 null。

span.span: If the value of either argument is null.

exception.span: 如果名稱引數的值無效。

span.span: If the value of the name argument is not valid.

exception.span: 參數名稱必須以字母為開頭，而且只能包含字母、數字和底線。

span.span: Parameter names must start with a letter and can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, class System.Type type) cil managed

param.name: name

span.span: The parameter name.

param.span: 這個名稱不應該包含在 [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] 陳述式中使用的 "@" 參數標記，而應該只包含實際名稱。

span.span: This name should not include the "@" parameter marker that is used in the [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] statements, only the actual name.

param.span: 運算式的第一個字元必須是字母。

span.span: The first character of the expression must be a letter.

param.span: 運算式中的任何後續字元必須是字母、數字或底線 (_) 字元。

span.span: Any successive characters in the expression must be either letters, numbers, or an underscore (_) character.

param.name: type
param.span: 參數的 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 型別。

span.span: The common language runtime (CLR) type of the parameter.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱和型別，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當參數具現化時，就無法變更參數名稱。When instantiated, the parameter name cannot be changed. 您可以透過 屬性設定或變更參數值。The parameter value can be set or changed through the property. 在查詢已經編譯完成之後，您就無法變更此值。After the query has been compiled, the value cannot be changed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢產生器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0).

exception.span: 如果任何一個引數的值為 null。

span.span: If the value of either argument is null.

exception.span: 如果名稱引數的值無效。

span.span: If the value of the name argument is invalid.

exception.span: 參數名稱必須以字母為開頭，而且只能包含字母、數字和底線。

span.span: Parameter names must start with a letter and can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得參數名稱 (只能透過建構函式設定)。

span.span: Gets the parameter name, which can only be set through a constructor.

value.span: 參數名稱 (只能透過建構函式設定)。

span.span: The parameter name, which can only be set through a constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當參數具現化時，就無法變更參數名稱。When instantiated, the parameter name cannot be changed. 您可以透過 屬性設定或變更參數值。The parameter value can be set or changed through the property. 在查詢已經編譯完成之後，您就無法變更此值。After the query has been compiled, the value cannot be changed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢產生器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會將新的參數加入至集合。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它會逐一查看 並顯示集合中每個參數的名稱、型別和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, type, and value of each parameter in the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_parameters)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_parameters)]

span.span: Gets the parameter type.
The of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數型別只能透過建構函式設定。The parameter type can only be set through a constructor. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會將新的參數加入至集合。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它會逐一查看 並顯示集合中每個參數的名稱、型別和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, type, and value of each parameter in the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_parameters)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_parameters)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Value { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the parameter value.
The parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在查詢已經編譯完成之後，您就無法變更此值。After the query has been compiled, the value cannot be changed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢產生器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 如果新的值與建構函式中宣告的型別不相容，它可能會導致執行階段例外狀況 (Exception)。If the new value is incompatible with the type declared in the constructor, it might cause a run-time exception. 提供者 (Provider) 必須判斷此值是否與宣告的型別相容。The provider must determine whether the value is compatible with the declared type. 例如，如果初始型別為 而且新的值是 ，您可能就會收到例外狀況。For example, if the initial type is and the new value is , you might receive an exception. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會將新的參數加入至集合。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它會逐一查看 並顯示集合中每個參數的名稱、型別和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, the type and the value of each parameter in the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_parameters)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_parameters)]
